headers.subject: [tosdr:1709] [Bad] Spotify doesn't provide refunds

html:
Spotify does not offer refunds upon termination of their services, either by you or Spotify.

If you or Spotify terminate the Terms, or if Spotify suspends your access to the Spotify Service, you agree that Spotify shall have no liability or responsibility to you and Spotify will not refund any amounts that you have already paid, to the fullest extent permitted under applicable law.

https://www.spotify.com/us/legal/end-user-agreement/ 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
